headline.main: RHODE ISLAND FIRES THREATEN TO OUST 50 TO 150 FAMILIES; Flames Start at Four New Spots in Coventry Section and Old Blaze Revives

lead_paragraph: PROVIDENCE, R.I., May 2 -- At least four new forest fires broke out in Western Rhode Island today and a resurgent old one threatened to bring about the evacuation of fifty to 150 families in the township of Coventry, name of tragic associations.
abstract: 4 new fires reptd; fire spread to Conn border
snippet: PROVIDENCE, R.I., May 2 -- At least four new forest fires broke out in Western Rhode Island today and a resurgent old one threatened to bring about the evacuation of fifty to 150 families in the township of Coventry, name of tragic associations....
